DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare heal time subjective pain level response nepafenac placebo photo refractive keratomileusis ( PRK ) surgery .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Topical Nepafenac Placebo Corneal Epithelial Healing Times Postoperative Pain Relief
DOC.criteria: 19 year old healthy ocular status preoperative refractive anisometropia le 2.000 diopter eye undergo bilateral PRK surgery . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Those desire PRK one eye , need additional topical eye medication , history drug/alcohol abuse , woman breastfeed pregnant . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
